title: I have Been Perma Banned...
body:
I have been perma banned today. it was for a reason i was toxic and went off on this person, but they were also an A hole but i chose not to report them. im not asking for a second chance I just need my rp. I have recently purchased rp and i feel like i should have that money back, or at least be able to transfer it to my other account or my friend.



can i please get some help with this

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to Player Support. It's unlikely they will help you given you broke the ToS/EULA, but since you didn't actually use the RP you *might* have a case to have that amount refunded or transferred. *Don't* count on it though, it's up to support.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Thanks dude I'm waiting for someone to respond..{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
